teams.allTeamsDescription: Manage all teams in the system. Click on a team to edit details or delete it.
teams.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this team? This action cannot be undone.
teams.createTeamDescription: Add a new team to the system with all necessary details.
teams.description: Manage all teams across all tournaments. View, edit, or delete team information.
teams.teamNotFoundDescription: The team you are looking for could not be found or may have been deleted.
teams.title: Teams Management

errors.emailExists: A user already exists with this email
errors.forbidden: You don't have permission to access this page
errors.notFound: Sorry, the page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved. Please check the URL or navigate using the link below.
errors.serverError: Server error, please try again later

auth.pleaseSignIn: Please sign in with your new account
auth.signInRequiredToCreateTeam: You need to sign in to create a team.

features.description: Tournado provides all the tools you need to manage your sports tournaments efficiently. From team registration to match scheduling, we've got you covered.
features.subtitle: Everything you need to manage your tournaments
features.title: Tournament Management Made Easy

hero.description: Manage your sports tournaments with ease. Create, organize, and track your teams and matches in one place.

android.chrome: Tap the menu (⋮) and select "Install app"
android.samsung: Tap the menu (⋮) and select "Add page to" then "Home screen"
android.title: Install this app on your device

ios.chrome: Tap the share button and then "Add to Home Screen"
ios.firefox: Tap the hamburger menu then "Share" and "Add to Home Screen"
ios.safari: Tap the share button and then "Add to Home Screen"
ios.title: Install this app on your iPhone

other.instruction: Open browser menu and select "Add to Home Screen"
other.title: Install this app on your device

teams.description: Register your team(s) for one or more tournaments

errors.clubNameTooLong: Club name must be less than 100 characters
errors.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
errors.phoneNumberInvalid: Please enter a valid phone number
errors.privacyAgreementRequired: You must agree to the privacy policy
errors.teamLeaderNameTooLong: Name must be less than 100 characters
errors.teamNameTooLong: Team name must be less than 50 characters

form.privacyAgreement: I agree to the privacy policy and terms of service

getStarted.description: Ready to join a tournament? Click the 'Add Team' button above to register your team and start competing!
getStarted.title: Get Started with Team Registration

teams.noTeamSelected: No team selected. Select a team on the left, or
